title: CAN Injection: Keyless car theft
dot:
digraph HighTechCarTheft{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];Start[label="Ian's Car Tampering Incident"];Tweet1[label="April 2022: First tampering incident
(Headlight cables unplugged)"];Tweet2[label="July 2022: Second tampering incident
(Bumper pulled, headlight unplugged)"];Theft[label="Car Stolen
(Headlight as entry point)"];Investigation[label="Ian Investigates the Theft"];Findings[label="Findings:
CAN Injection Vulnerability
(ECU communication exploited)"];DarkWeb[label="Dark Web Research:
Devices for bypassing car security"];CANInjection[label="CAN Injection Attack:
Fake messages injected via CAN bus"]; Vulnerable[label="Vulnerable Systems:
Smart Key, Immobilizer, Door Lock"];Device[label="CAN Injector Device:
Modified JBL Speaker
($10 of components)"];Method[label="Attack Method:
1. Access CAN via headlight wiring
2. Send fake 'Key Validated'
3. Unlock door & start engine"];Solution[label="Proposed Solutions:
1. Quick Fix
2. Cryptographic Messaging"];QuickFix[label="Quick Fix:
Detect unusual CAN errors
and block invalid messages"];CryptoFix[label="Cryptographic Messaging:
Authenticate CAN messages using HSM"];Collaboration[label="Need for Collaboration:
Car manufacturers & security experts"];Start->Tweet1->Tweet2->Theft;Theft->Investigation;Investigation->Findings->DarkWeb->CANInjection;CANInjection->Vulnerable;CANInjection->Device->Method;Findings->Solution;Solution->QuickFix;Solution->CryptoFix;Investigation->Collaboration;}

title: Firefox engineers discover a Windows Defender bug that causes high CPU usage
dot:
digraph Bugzilla_Analysis{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=8];subgraph cluster_bug_report{label="Bug 1441918: Antimalware Service Executable (Windows Defender) High CPU Usage with Firefox";style=dashed;color=grey;Reporter[label="Reporter: Markus Jaritz"];Description[label="Description: High CPU Usage by 
Antimalware Service Executable 
when using Firefox"];Status[label="Status: RESOLVED FIXED"];Priority[label="Priority: P3"];Severity[label="Severity: S3"];Tracking[label="Tracking: Multiple Firefox Versions"];Attachments[label="Attachments: Logs & Screenshots"];References[label="References: 
Depends on 1 bug, Blocks 2 bugs"];Reporter->Description;Description->Status[label="Resolved"];Description->Priority;Description->Severity;Description->Tracking;Description->Attachments;Description->References;}subgraph cluster_analysis{label="Analysis & Discussion";style=dotted;color=blue;RootCause[label="Root Cause: High VirtualProtect Calls"];Impact[label="Impact: Increased MsMpEng.exe CPU Usage"];Investigations[label="Investigations: Process Tracing, ETW Events"];MicrosoftFix[label="Microsoft Fix: 
Updated mpengine.dll"];FirefoxFix[label="Firefox Fix: Reduce VirtualProtect Calls"];RootCause->Impact;RootCause->Investigations;Investigations->MicrosoftFix;Investigations->FirefoxFix;MicrosoftFix->Status[lhead=cluster_bug_report, label="Fix Deployed"];}subgraph cluster_feedback{label="User Feedback & Observations";style=solid;color=green;UserReports[label="User Reports: CPU spikes with MsMpEng.exe"];Feedback[label="Feedback to Microsoft"];FixObservation[label="Observation: Fix Reduced CPU Usage by ~75%"];UserReports->Feedback;Feedback->MicrosoftFix[lhead=cluster_analysis];MicrosoftFix->FixObservation;}}

title: Segment Anything Model (SAM) can "cut out" any object in an image
dot:
digraph SAM_Research{graph[rankdir=LR, fontsize=12, fontname="Arial"];node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontsize=10, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontsize=9, fontname="Arial"];SAM[label="Segment Anything Model (SAM)
- Meta AI's AI model for segmentation
- Zero-shot generalization
- No additional training needed" style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];Prompts[label="Prompts in SAM
- Interactive points/boxes
- Bounding box prompts
- Ambiguity-aware design
- Enables flexible integration" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];Outputs[label="Extensible Outputs
- Object masks for video tracking
- Image editing applications
- Creative tasks (e.g., collaging)
- 3D lifting capability" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];Generalization[label="Zero-shot Generalization
- Learns general notion of objects
- Works on unfamiliar objects/images
- No additional training required" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];DataEngine[label="SAM's Data Engine
- Model-in-the-loop
- Interactive annotations
- Improved dataset/model through cycles" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];Dataset[label="Dataset
- 11M licensed images
- 1.1B+ segmentation masks
- Automatic annotation using SAM
- Privacy-preserving images" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];ModelDesign[label="Efficient Model Design
- One-time image encoder
- Lightweight mask decoder
- Runs in milliseconds per prompt" style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];Prompts->Outputs[label="Flexible integration"];Outputs->Generalization[label="Supports zero-shot tasks"];Generalization->DataEngine[label="Improves model capabilities"];DataEngine->Dataset[label="Generates large-scale data"];Dataset->ModelDesign[label="Informs efficient model design"];Training[label="Training Process
- Millions of images and masks
- Repeated annotation cycles
- Improves SAM's ambiguity handling" style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];ResearchTeam[label="Research Team
- Meta AI researchers
- Collaborative contributions
- Published findings" style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];Dataset->Training[label="Training data source"];Training->SAM[label="Enhanced segmentation capabilities"];ResearchTeam->SAM[label="Developed and refined"];Newsletter[label="Stay Updated
- Research news
- Meta AI breakthroughs
- Events and updates" style=dotted, fillcolor=white];SAM->Prompts[label="Uses prompts for segmentation"];SAM->Outputs[label="Generates masks for uses"];SAM->Generalization[label="General object understanding"];SAM->ModelDesign[label="Efficient architecture"];}
